articles.title: Learning how to communicate with older people or loved ones with dementia can be confusing — and joyful - ABC News
articles.description: Recent films have depicted the distress and frustration of children caring for parents with dementia but may leave viewers grappling with a crucial question: How should you speak to someone with dementia?
articles.content:
